# NicheNet test case study

## Case study problem definition 
- Human single cell RNA-seq data by Puram et al to study the malignant and nonmalignant cell composition in the head and neck squamous cell carcinoma (HNSCC) tumors. A subset of tumor cells express EMT program, and those cells are located in close proximity to cancer-associated fibroblasts (CAFs).
